attributes.action: stop OSC (Open Source Consortium) from blocking BBC's iPlayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC is well respected within the online community for providing accessible web services. The BBC is extending their services with the introduction of iPlayer. It's first release will meet the needs of the majority of web users in the UK, with subsequent releases addressing the minority web users. The OSC's attempt to block iPlayer from being released to the majority of web users will delay access this service for a significant amount of time to the detriment of license fee payers, this must not be permitted.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
